resources.string: Catalist is a free online classifieds aimed at the student community. What ever you want to sell around campus, you can put it on Catalist free of charge. You can now sell or look for used stationery, appliances, gadgets and more. This is an initiative started to cover the large student community that the already existing online classifieds do not cater for.

Catalist is built for students, by students. So its simple to navigate through and simple to use even for the new computer users. Your search can be institution, campus or category specific. This ensures that you always get the most relevant results to what you are looking for. Available ofor mobile devices so that you can still search and post your adverts on the move where ever you are.

The main aim of Catalist is to promote young entrepreneurship and help make student life easier. The cost of studies and living expenses alone are great so selling what you do not use anymore can help sustain you financially.
We aim at being the leader in student classifieds across the continent. So let\'s work together at making student life easier.
Thanks, Advert Reported. We will look at it.
